title: Fed Considering 'Skinny' Master Accounts for Crypto Banks on 'Streamlined Timeline'
contentSnippet: “Skinny” master accounts would give banks focused on payments innovation access to the Fed, but restrict certain benefits.

title: Don’t let your Bitcoin die with you — here’s how to prepare before it’s too late
contentSnippet: It is essential to secure your BTC, altcoins and NFTs with a crypto inheritance plan that safeguards keys and simplifies wealth transfer for heirs.

title: Aave Rebounds Above $230 Confirming Double-Bottom Reversal
contentSnippet: On the news front, Aave said it would expand its collateral assets with Maple Finance's  institutional-grade yield tokens.

title: OpenAI Targets Google Chrome With ChatGPT Atlas AI Web Browser Launch
contentSnippet: OpenAI has launched ChatGPT Atlas, an AI-powered web browser designed to integrate chat, browsing, and automation into one tool—a move that pits the AI pioneer directly against browser giants.

title: XRP Spikes 3% as Gold Slips and Bitcoin Extends Gains
contentSnippet: Ripple’s ongoing $1 billion capital raise continued to support sentiment among professional traders seeking exposure to regulated-linked tokens.

title: Europol Takes Down Cybercrime Network in Latvia, Seizes $330,000 in Crypto
contentSnippet: The network provided SIM boxes and cards that fraudsters used to set up fake online accounts, stealing more than $5 million in Austria.

title: Filecoin Jumps More Than 4% After Retaking $1.60 Resistance Level
contentSnippet: The token has support at the $1.52 level and resistance at $1.65.

title: British Columbia Wants to Permanently Ban New Crypto Mining Sites
contentSnippet: The Canadian province says the move will protect clean energy for sectors creating jobs and growth.

title: SharpLink Makes First Ethereum Buy in Over a Month as ETH Holdings Top $3.5 Billion
contentSnippet: Ethereum treasury firm SharpLink Gaming last week bought $79 million in ETH, marking its first crypto buy in over a month.

title: Bitcoin whales quietly embrace BlackRock ETF following SEC rule change
contentSnippet: Bitcoin’s biggest holders are moving billions into ETFs like BlackRock’s IBIT, signaling a new phase of institutional adoption.

title: HBAR Slides 4.3% as Institutional Selling Breaks Key Support
contentSnippet: Hedera’s HBAR token tumbled amid heavy early-session sell pressure, breaching critical support before a sharp, high-volume rebound tempered losses in the final hour.

title: Fed mulls ‘skinny’ payment accounts to open rails for fintech, crypto firms
contentSnippet: Industry watchers welcomed the idea of “skinny” master accounts as another sign of the end of crypto’s banking troubles, in what insiders describe as “Operation Chokepoint 2.0.”

title: Ethereum Remains Volatile Ahead of US Inflation Report as ETH ETFs Shed Assets
contentSnippet: Ethereum ETFs lost $145 million on Monday as investors awaited delayed inflation data amid the longest-ever government shutdown fears.

title: BitcoinOS Raises $10M to Expand Institutional BTCFi Capabilities
contentSnippet: Greenfield Capital led the round with backing from FalconX, Bitcoin Frontier Fund and DNA Fund to advance zero-knowledge-powered Bitcoin infrastructure

title: Galaxy Stock Jumps on 140% Trading Volume Increase in Q3
contentSnippet: The figure reflects an 80,000 Bitcoin sale.

title: Strategy Gets Buy Rating From Citi on Bullish Bitcoin Outlook
contentSnippet: The Wall Street bank initiated coverage of Strategy with a buy/high risk rating and a $485 price target.

title: Bitcoin Catches Bid, Jumping Above $112K as Gold and Silver Plunge
contentSnippet: Watching from the sidelines for weeks as precious metals scored record highs on a regular basis, bitcoin on Tuesday was gaining as gold and silver posted their steepest declines in years.

title: Andrew Cuomo’s crypto Hail Mary unlikely to give an edge over Mamdani
contentSnippet: As the New York mayor’s race draws to a culmination, Andrew Cuomo has developed a crypto and AI strategy for the city.

title: California just drew the line between crypto and cash: Here’s why it matters
contentSnippet: California’s SB 822 ends forced crypto sell-offs and requires holders to send in-kind transfers of unclaimed crypto to the state, promoting stronger consumer rights.

title: Galaxy Digital Says Helios a ‘Gold Rush,’ Reveals Q3 Revenue Beat and Client Growth
contentSnippet: Galaxy COO Chris Ferraro touted disciplined execution and Galaxy One’s appeal to high-net-worth clients; execs say funding efficiency will drive long-term profitability.

title: Gov. Waller: U.S. Fed to 'Embrace Disruption,' Pitches 'Skinny' Master Account Idea
contentSnippet: At its first event on payment innovations, the Federal Reserve's Christopher Waller suggested a compromise over the crypto world's "master account" aims.

title: Bitcoin taps $110K as BTC price diverges from 5% gold correction
contentSnippet: Bitcoin returned to $110,000 after bouncing at the weekend's CME futures gap, contrasting with 5.5% daily losses and a potential double top for gold.

title: How Batched Threshold Encryption could end extractive MEV and make DeFi fair again
contentSnippet: BTE offers epochless, constant-size decryption shares (as small as 48 bytes) that can help layer-2 rollups to achieve pending transaction privacy.

title: Coinbase Sees TradFi Institutions Driving Crypto Derivatives Boom
contentSnippet: The listed exchange expects a rebalance from Asia's dominance towards U.S. and Europe-based, non-market maker institutions.

title: Fake social media accounts: The rise of Cointelegraph impersonators, explained
contentSnippet: Fake “Cointelegraph” accounts are scamming crypto users. Learn how to spot impostors, verify identities and stay protected in 2025.

title: Here’s what happened in crypto today
contentSnippet: Need to know what happened in crypto today? Here is the latest news on daily trends and events impacting Bitcoin price, blockchain, DeFi, NFTs, Web3 and crypto regulation.

title: Ethereum Core Veteran: Vitalik Buterin Has 'Complete Indirect Control’ Over Ecosystem
contentSnippet: Geth lead Péter Szilágyi’s criticisms of the Ethereum Foundation prompted Polygon CEO Sandeep Nailwal to chime in with his own issues.

title: Binance’s $33M charity gift becomes Malta’s political minefield
contentSnippet: Malta’s Finance Minister Clyde Caruana backed a government-run charity’s decision to reject a now $33 million Binance donation due to reputational concerns.

title: Coinbase Acquires Crypto Fundraising Platform Echo for $375 Million
contentSnippet: The deal marks Coinbase's another major acquisition this year as it builds infrastructure spanning token creation, fundraising, and secondary trading.

title: Morning Minute: Coinbase Buys Cobie's Echo & Up Only NFT for $375M
contentSnippet: It's a major win for the on-chain economy, builders, investors—and even Crypto Twitter, which now gets its favorite show back.

title: 日銀副総裁、ステーブルコインが国際決済の中核担う可能性を指摘
contentSnippet: 日銀の氷見野副総裁は21日、ステーブルコインが国際決済システムの主要プレーヤーとして浮上する可能性があると指摘。世界の資産の半分がノンバンク保有で規制の枠組みが追いつかない現状に警鐘を鳴らした。

title: ヴィタリック、ゼロ知識証明を10倍高速化する新技術「GKRプロトコル」を解説
contentSnippet: イーサリアム共同創設者ヴィタリック・ブテリン氏が、ZK証明を高速化する新技術「GKRプロトコル」を解説した。従来のSTARKと比較して約10分の1のコストで検証が可能になるという。長期目標「Lean Ethereum」の実現に向けた重要技術として注目される。

title: SBI系ビットポイント、法人のイーサリアム活用支援を強化
contentSnippet: SBIグループのビットポイントジャパンは、株式会社Def consultingとの提携により、イーサリアムを活用した法人向けの資産運用支援を強化。最新の戦略で企業価値向上を目指す。

title: 片山さつき氏、財務大臣に起用　暗号資産規制整備にも期待
contentSnippet: 片山さつき氏が新財務相に就任。1988年に財務省入省後、金融政策や暗号資産規制、税制改革に関与してきた実績が注目されている。

title: X、ユーザーネーム市場を開設し最高100万ドルで販売開始
contentSnippet: Xがプレミアム会員向けにユーザーネーム市場を開設し、非アクティブなユーザーネームを最高100万ドルで販売すると報じられた。無料の「プライオリティ」と有料の「レア」の2種類を提供する。

title: 株価大幅下落のソラナ・カンパニー、私募株ロックアップ解除を予定通り実施へ
contentSnippet: パンテラ・キャピタルが支援するソラナ・カンパニーは、株価下落する中、私募株のロックアップ解除を予定通り実施すると発表。「絆創膏を一気に剥がす」アプローチで、市場の圧力に対処する方針を示した。

title: ナスダック上場グリーンレーン、165億円調達でベラチェーン（BERA）戦略を開始
contentSnippet: 米グリーンレーン・ホールディングスが1.1億ドルの私募増資を実施し、仮想通貨BERAの保有戦略を開始すると発表した。ポリチェーン・キャピタル主導で上場企業として最大規模のベラ保有者を目指す。

title: アマゾンAWSの大規模障害、コインベースやロビンフッドにも影響
contentSnippet: アマゾンAWSの障害で仮想通貨取引所コインベースや取引アプリのロビンフッドに一時不具合が発生した。集中型クラウドへの依存リスクが改めて浮き彫りになった。

title: パンプファン、ミームコインローンチ市場を再び支配　日次1.5億円収益維持＝報道
contentSnippet: ミームコインローンチパッドのパンプファンが市場シェア95%を獲得し独占状態に。市場低迷下でも日次1.5億円の収益を維持。圧倒的な卒業数と強固な回復力を示す。

title: ユーザー数5500万人突破、Web3ソーシャルインフラ「UXLINK」のCEOが描くマスアダプションへの道
contentSnippet: UXLINK CEOローランド・サフォー・ンタゲ氏の独占インタビュー。Telegram基盤で5500万ユーザーを抱えるWeb3ソーシャルインフラの戦略と日本市場への期待を聞いた。
